typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		GENDER as string,
		SALARY as integer,
		DEPT as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		NAAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(ID) as MaxEmpID from dbo.EMP;',
	format: 'query') ~> EMPSINCACHE
EMPSINCACHE sink(mapColumn(
		GENDER,
		SALARY,
		DEPT,
		COUNTRY,
		NAAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
